title: Silverglen Walk - West End
description: The soft hush of rustling ivy and distant birdsong gives this narrow stone lane a quiet charm. Flanked by old ivy-covered buildings and delicate wrought-iron balconies, Silverglen Walk feels more like a secluded garden path than a city street. Small flowerbeds sit beneath every window, and the stonework underfoot is smooth and pale. To the west, the path opens into the bustling Market Square.

west.description: Silverglen Walk opens west into Market Square, where the peaceful lane meets the cityâ€™s busy heart.

extra_descriptions.description: Thick green ivy climbs the walls of the buildings here, carefully trimmed to avoid windows and signage.
Delicate wrought-iron balconies extend from the upper stories, each one adorned with potted flowers and wind chimes.
